abstract: An appeals court decision dealt a blow to government efforts to obtain emails stored overseas, mainly because laws have not kept up with technology.
snippet: An appeals court decision dealt a blow to government efforts to obtain emails stored overseas, mainly because laws have not kept up with technology.
lead_paragraph: The battle over the privacy of electronic communications sought in government investigations shifted against the Justice Department last week.

headline.main: Microsoft Case Shows the Limits of a Data Privacy Law
